Name: I wish it was morning all the time
About the game: I wish it was morning all the time' is a survival game in which players must choose the best option and survive. The sisters, who are pursued by a group of men, flee to an abandoned house without knowing what is going on. The sisters, who have no idea what is going on, flee to an abandoned house where they are being chased. Together, they build a barricade to keep the monsters outside from getting inside. Seek the light in the midst of the never-ending torment. Your every action will determine their survival. ＜Game Features All parameters are visualized. Each icon on the screen has its own role. 　Choose the appropriate action considering what you need to do right now. When you reach the ending, your score will be displayed. 　Choose the action with the highest point to increase the score. 　Aim for a higher score by choosing the action with higher points.
